definition[0]: to leave a place, especially secretly, in order to escape from someone or something
example[0]: Toby ran away from home at the age of 14.
definition[1]: to try to avoid dealing with a problem or difficult situation

definition[2]: to secretly go away with someone in order to marry them or live with them
